Articles.Content:
Ok well today I have decided I'm going to try to live stream some random shenanigans in KSP. Seeing how I am still relatively new to the game don't expect me to be doing anything amazing, though I'm sure there will be plenty of epic fails. Hope to see you guys there if not then hopefully next time.

Anyways here is the link:

Also I couldn't figure out where this was suppose to be posted and I figured that the General Board would be okay. Sorry if this is incorrect as I am still relatively unfamiliar with the forums as well.

Update: Currently having issues with the Live stream and will now be attempting to resolve said issues. I'll update again when things are in working order.

Edited April 29, 2013 by GenexTheLlama
